credit_line: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy (Liebes) Morin
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 19 x 24 cm (7 1/2 x 9 7/16 in.)
title: Sample
description: Heavy twill in shades of pink, black and metallic gold yarns. Warp is eight yarns of 2-ply pink yarn alternating with four wrapped metallic gold yarns. Weft has bands of two different plied pink yarns, pink chenille, flat metallic gold threads with wrapped metallic gold yarns, flat metallic gold braid, black plied yarn, flat black plastic braid, blue plied yarn and purple plied yarn.
name: Sample
